error.message: Call to deprecated function module_load_include(). Deprecated in drupal:9.4.0 and is removed from drupal:11.0.0. Use Drupal::moduleHandler()->loadInclude($module, $type, $name = NULL). Note that including code from uninstalled extensions is no longer supported.

The 'select' library is depending on a deprecated library. The core/jquery.once asset library is deprecated in Drupal 9.3.0 and will be removed in Drupal 10.0.0. Use the core/once library instead. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3158256
Value of core_version_requirement: ^8.9 || ^9.1 is not compatible with the next major version of Drupal core. See https://drupal.org/node/3070687.
